mapper.sql: id, totalNum, cashierstatic, paymentType, invoiceNo, cashiertime, staffId, onCredit, interior, clientId, change, Number, otherone, othertwo, otherthree, otherfour, otherfive
mapper.select: SELECT id, totalNum, cashierstatic, paymentType, invoiceNo, cashiertime, staffId, onCredit, interior, clientId, Number, otherone, othertwo, otherthree, otherfour, otherfive FROM `cashier`
mapper.insert: insert into cashier (id, totalNum, cashierstatic, paymentType, invoiceNo, cashiertime, staffId, onCredit, interior, clientId, `change`, `Number`, otherone, othertwo, otherthree, otherfour, otherfive) values (#{id}, #{totalNum}, #{cashierstatic}, #{paymentType}, #{invoiceNo}, #{cashiertime}, #{staffId}, #{onCredit}, #{interior}, #{clientId}, #{change}, #{Number}, #{otherone}, #{othertwo}, #{otherthree}, #{otherfour}, #{otherfive})
